definition: Hokkaidō, Japan
north/(classical) to be defeated
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Qiang ginger and to win with Hokkaido, but though two fang Buddha become two strangers.
sentences.chinese: 羌姜與至嬴雖同在北海道，但二人彷佛成爲陌路人。

sentences.english: Tourism officials call it the “Hokkaido boom”.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊局的官員稱這種現象爲“北海道熱潮”。

sentences.english: A city of southwest Hokkaido, Japan, on Tsugaru Strait.
sentences.chinese: 函館日本北海道西南部一城市，位於津輕海峽邊。

sentences.english: Recently I had a flight to Hokkaido or "Snow Country" in the month of most heavy snow from the ancient time to nowadays – February.
sentences.chinese: 筆者最近的一次飛行，目的地是有雪國之稱的北海道。

sentences.english: If you go to Hokkaido, you bring back Shiroi Koibito chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去北海道，那麼就帶點白色戀人巧克力。

sentences.english: The Ainu settlers in Hokkaido are the last remnant of a prehistoric race.
sentences.chinese: 北海道的阿伊努人是史前某個種族的最後殘存者。

sentences.english: Furano, Hokkaido, Japan and therefore known as the Eastern Provence.
sentences.chinese: 日本北海道的富良野也因此被譽爲了東方的普羅旺斯。

sentences.english: Noon aircraft arrived in Hokkaido new chitose airport.
sentences.chinese: 中午飛機抵達了北海道的新千歲機場。

sentences.english: Tourism officials call it the "Hokkaido boom".
sentences.chinese: 旅遊部門官員稱之爲“北海道的繁榮”。

sentences.english: Hokkaido is one of the residences of A'YiNu people.
sentences.chinese: 北海道是阿伊努民族的居住地之一。

sentences.english: The group home for the elderly people with dementia built in the residential section in Noboribetsu City, Hokkaido, JAPAN.
sentences.chinese: 該住宅爲老人院癡呆症的人構建，位於日本北海道。

sentences.english: Hiraoka Park's plum is famous in Hokkaido.
sentences.chinese: 平岡公園以梨子樹及梅花聞名北海道。

sentences.english: Kunashir lies about 10 miles (16 km) from Hokkaido.
sentences.chinese: 國後島距離北海道大約10英里。

sentences.english: Hokkaido crab meat relatively soft, gently suck the meat can be imported.
sentences.chinese: 北海道蟹的肉質比較鬆軟，輕輕一嘬，肉就可以入口。

sentences.english: The Snow Festival in Hokkaido is a dazzling spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 北海道的雪祭景觀令人眼花撩亂。

sentences.english: It is the island's only ice-free trading port.
sentences.chinese: 它是北海道唯一的不凍商業港。
